content.title: UI for Adding Recipients
content.body:
1. From the bottom-left corner of Visualizer, navigate to the Default Library.
  2. Next to the Default Library, you will see the My Libraries tab and a search icon.
    Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter AddRecipient.
  4. From the results, under RecipientsMobile, select AddRecipient.
  5. Drag the AddRecipient collection onto the frmAddRecipient on the canvas.
